website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy pottery wheel that is compact and reasonably-priced, making it perfect for novices and budget-minded artists.
pros: Boasts durable iron construction that feels solid
Non-slip surface makes it easy to sculpt and glaze
Smaller footprint is simple to transport and store
cons: A few reports of wheels that didn't spin freely

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality....
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this thing at all. Won't even spin one revolution without grinding to a halt. Either lousy bearings or press-fit in place too tightly? Tried lubricant and it didn't help. Both top and bottom cast pieces are uneven and off-center. Paint job is lousy and mine arrived with black bare spots on top. In short, nothing good to say about this wheel at all. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't spin freely
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small turntable it is a solid and heavy duty. However the ball bearings or whatever they use to allow the top to spin is not smooth. I thought I would be able to spin it and apply glaze to my pottery. However spending it results in maybe I half a turn at best. I always thought the point of a turntable would be that spun freely. This one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Howton

customer_reviews.title: Unstable and unusable
customer_reviews.text: The wheel I received had a nice weight, but it had an extreme wobble with no balance to the wheelhead. Though I didn't need a perfect wheel, I had to return it because it was simply unusable with no stability. I purchased the blue one, also available on Amazon, and it is easily worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna C. Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Not a true banding wheel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for pottery. For those who know pottery needs, this stand is no where near the quality of the Shimpo banding wheels. It only spins for about 1/8 the time a Shimpo banding wheel spins for. Additional info: ships from within the USA, but Made in China
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Quest

customer_reviews.title: Works as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Nice heavy base. Swivels well. I was using it to work on an 18" diameter pot. I thought I would need a larger top surface, but this worked well.
customer_reviews.author: VEGAN YOGINI

customer_reviews.title: It as slick as ones that cost much more, but still
customer_reviews.text: No regrets buying this. Does exactly what I wanted and is sturdy enough to stand up to fair abuse. Not as big, or as super slick as wheels that cost 3x as much, but still pretty nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS KNITE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sculpting/Maquettes
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Its fairly light weight so I can travel with it and sculpt on the go. I typically use this for my Maquettes and the large for my bigger sculptures. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Zhanidj

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, but the wheel has a wobble & the surface is rough not smooth & has some sharp pieces around centering circles. I won't be able to really use for glaze details, but should be fine to turn peice just not spin.
customer_reviews.author: La'Chell Henry

customer_reviews.title: Spin is not good.
customer_reviews.text: The wheel does not spin freely and there is no way that I can see to fix it. Threw my money away on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's small and sturdy! Great for crafts. I want like 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not super useful
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with a wheel, a little Wobbly, very small
customer_reviews.author: annalyn

customer_reviews.title: My son loves that its manual
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery Thank you my son will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Monic Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product
customer_reviews.text: This is being used in a ceramics class. It's sturdy, spins well, and does exactly what it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: AQ.

customer_reviews.title: Great product- will go with the bigger size next time
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Makes decorating my projects easier; however I will go with the larger size for next time.
customer_reviews.author: kerri c

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very sturdy. Nice ball bearing action, allowing this to spin freely and smoothly. I use for glazing my bisque items.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo Risin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to turn even with heavy item on it
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Really comes in handy.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, don't know how I got along before this. It gets used every day.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Reinardy

customer_reviews.title: Best banding wheel I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought this for doing delicate things to my projects. I love it it's so heavy, so it stays in place, turns easily. My only complaint is the texture, but it's only going to effect the bottom of the pot, so who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Wheel works as intended and happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth R

customer_reviews.title: Wobble
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a while & now has a wobble. Disappointed. Would be cool if I could fix it somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It doesn’t come apart like my older banding wheel. Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Falling in Art Heavy Duty Metal Pottery Decorating Banding Wheel, 7 Inches Diameter
product_meta.description:
Size:7 inch MetalFalling in Art 7'' diameter metal banding wheel

Product Dimensions
Turntable work area diameter: 3 1/4 inches in diameter,4 1/2 inches in diameter,5 1/6 inches in diameter 
Chassis diameter:5 5/7 inches in diameter
Height: 4 1/7 inches
Weight: 3.77 pounds
Material: iron,rubber

Kindly Note
1.Please not place it on the edge of the desktop.
2.Place in a dry environment to extend product life.
feature_bullets: MULTI-FUNCTION - - Can be used for sculptor or decorator working in pottery,clay design,model-marking and other artistic work
WITHOUT ELECTRICITY - - Made of indestructible iron wheel can be slowly manual rotation for fine detail artwork
EASY PLACE - - Can be moved easily by single hand; Chassis is equipped with rubber pad and holds the wheel firmly
SUITABLE HEIGHT - - 4 1/7 inches high,can turn the turntable easily
NONSLIP SURFACE - - When turning, even a piece of paper placed on top will not slip easily

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars171 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
